content: 14 15 sts that is what you have on n1 abbreviations possibly place a marker a and turn *instruction to repeat* slip 1 purl 27 29 sts that is across n1 and n4 bor = beginning of round possibly place a marker b and turn k2tog = knit 2 stitches together now you ll work flat on these 28 30 sts between n1 = needle 1 the first you work when you markers bor is just in the middle begin working in the round row1 rs *sl1 k1* repeat to the end p2tog = purl 2 stitches together row2 ws sl1 purl all sl1 = slip1 purlwise repeat these 2 row until you ve worked a total of ssk = slip1 slip1 knitwise knit passed sts 28 30 row together tip to know how many row you ve already st = stitch worked count the column of slipped sts they sts = stitches should be 14 15
